Generation I.Red: When it locks eyes with an enemy, it will use a mix of PSI moves such as Hypnosis and Confusion .
Generation I.Green: (This entry was originally untranslated in English until it was reused in Pokémon FireRed .)
Generation I.Blue: When it locks eyes with an enemy, it will use a mix of PSI moves such as Hypnosis and Confusion .
Generation I.Yellow: Avoid eye contact if you come across one. It will try to put you to sleep by using its pendulum.
Generation I.Stadium: If you lock eyes with it, it will try to hypnotize you. It is best to close your eyes quickly before you get hypnotized.

Generation II.Gold: When it is very hungry, it puts humans it meets to sleep, then it feasts on their dreams.
Generation II.Silver: Always holding a pendulum that it rocks at a steady rhythm, it causes drowsiness in anyone nearby.
Generation II.Crystal: The longer it swings its pendulum, the longer the effects of its hypnosis last.
Generation II.Stadium 2: When it is very hungry, it puts humans it meets to sleep, then it feasts on their dreams. (Pokémon Red, Silver, or Crystal inserted) Always holding a pendulum that it rocks at a steady rhythm, it causes drowsiness in anyone nearby. (Pokémon Blue, Gold, or Yellow inserted)

Generation III.Ruby: Hypno holds a pendulum in its hand. The arcing movement and glitter of the pendulum lull the foe into a deep state of hypnosis. While this Pok é mon searches for prey, it polishes the pendulum.
Generation III.Sapphire: Hypno holds a pendulum in its hand. The arcing movement and glitter of the pendulum lull the foe into a deep state of hypnosis. While this Pok é mon searches for prey, it polishes the pendulum.
Generation III.Emerald: The arcing movement and glitter of the pendulum in a Hypno 's hand lull the foe into deep hypnosis. While searching for prey, it polishes the pendulum.
Generation III.FireRed: It carries a pendulum-like device. There once was an incident in which it took away a child it hypnotized.
Generation III.LeafGreen: When it locks eyes with an enemy, it will use a mix of PSI moves such as Hypnosis and Confusion .

Generation IV.Diamond: Seeing its swinging pendulum can induce sleep in three seconds, even in someone who just woke up.
Generation IV.Pearl: Seeing its swinging pendulum can induce sleep in three seconds, even in someone who just woke up.
Generation IV.Platinum: Seeing its swinging pendulum can induce sleep in three seconds, even in someone who just woke up.
Generation IV.HeartGold: When it is very hungry, it puts humans it meets to sleep, then it feasts on their dreams.
Generation IV.SoulSilver: Always holding a pendulum that it swings at a steady rhythm, it causes drowsiness in anyone nearby.

Generation VI.X: It carries a pendulum-like device. There once was an incident in which it took away a child it hypnotized.
Generation VI.Y: Seeing its swinging pendulum can induce sleep in three seconds, even in someone who just woke up.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: Hypno holds a pendulum in its hand. The arcing movement and glitter of the pendulum lull the foe into a deep state of hypnosis. While this Pokémon searches for prey, it polishes the pendulum.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Hypno holds a pendulum in its hand. The arcing movement and glitter of the pendulum lull the foe into a deep state of hypnosis. While this Pokémon searches for prey, it polishes the pendulum.

Generation VII.Sun: While it is an extremely dangerous Pokémon, people who are in need of a good, sound sleep call it their savior.
Generation VII.Moon: As a matter of course, it makes anyone it meets fall asleep and has a taste of their dreams. Anyone having a good dream, it carries off.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: In Alola, Komala is Hypno's main target. It rarely harms people.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: There are some Hypno that assist doctors with patients who can't sleep at night in hospitals.
Generation VII.Let's Go Pikachu: Avoid eye contact if you come across one. It will try to put you to sleep by using its pendulum.
Generation VII.Let's Go Eevee: Avoid eye contact if you come across one. It will try to put you to sleep by using its pendulum.

Generation VIII.Brilliant Diamond: Seeing its swinging pendulum can induce sleep in three seconds, even in someone who just woke up.
Generation VIII.Shining Pearl: Seeing its swinging pendulum can induce sleep in three seconds, even in someone who just woke up.

Generation IV.HeartGold: Route 11 Safari Zone Night (tall grass in Swamp, default, and with 5 Forest points)
